languages.text: {n}Абеляр хватается за голову.{/n} "Разрази меня Движущая Сила, я, кажется, понял! Этот несчастный безумец принял за гвардейца ксеноса, которого экипаж выкурил во время давешнего варп-перелета... помните, Лорд-капитан? Взбесившийся друкари, который подчинил себе нескольких членов экипажа?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр хватается за голову.{/n} "Разрази меня Движущая Сила, я, кажется, понял! Этот несчастный безумец принял за гвардейца ксеноса, которого экипаж выкурил во время давешнего варп-перелета... помните, Лорд-капитан? Взбесившийся друкари, который подчинил себе нескольких членов экипажа?"

languages.text: {n}Abelard clutches his head.{/n} "Motive Force strike me down, I think I've got it! The xenos that the crew smoked out during the recent warp jump! This poor madman must have taken him for a Guardsman... Remember, Lord Captain? The enraged Drukhari who had bent several crew members to his will?"
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр хватается за голову.{/n} "Разрази меня Движущая Сила, я, кажется, понял! Этот несчастный безумец принял за гвардейца ксеноса, которого экипаж выкурил во время давешнего варп-перелета... помните, Лорд-капитан? Взбесившийся друкари, который подчинил себе нескольких членов экипажа?"

This poor madman must have taken him for a Guardsman... Remember, Lord Captain? The enraged Drukhari who had bent several crew members to his will?"

{n}Abelard clutches his head.{/n} "Motive Force strike me down, I think I've got it! The xenos that the crew smoked out during the recent warp jump! This poor madman must have taken him for a Guardsman... Remember, Lord Captain? The enraged Drukhari who had bent several crew members to his will?"

languages.text: {n}アベラルドが頭を抱える。{/n}「原動力よ、いっそ我を殺してくれ…わかりました！先日のワープジャンプでクルーがあぶりだした異種族の仕業です！この哀れな狂人は奴をガーズマンと勘違いしたのでしょう…覚えていますか、ロード・キャプテン？何人ものクルーを意のままに操った、あのデュカーリです」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clutches his head.{/n} "Motive Force strike me down, I think I've got it! The xenos that the crew smoked out during the recent warp jump! This poor madman must have taken him for a Guardsman... Remember, Lord Captain? The enraged Drukhari who had bent several crew members to his will?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラードが頭を抱える。{/n}「機械教団よ、いっそ我を殺してくれ…わかりました！先日のワープジャンプでクルーがあぶりだした異種族の仕業です！この哀れな狂人は奴をガーズマンと勘違いしたのでしょう…覚えていますか、ロード・キャプテン？何人ものクルーを意のままに操った、あのデュカーリです」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德紧紧地捂住了头。{/n}“愿源力惩罚我，我明白是怎么回事了！是那些船员在最近这场亚空间航行中发现的异形！这个可怜的疯子肯定是把那个异形当成了帝国卫队的卫兵……您还记得吗，舰长大人？就是那个怒气冲冲的黑暗灵族，强迫几位船员屈从他的意志。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clutches his head.{/n} "Motive Force strike me down, I think I've got it! The xenos that the crew smoked out during the recent warp jump! This poor madman must have taken him for a Guardsman... Remember, Lord Captain? The enraged Drukhari who had bent several crew members to his will?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德紧紧地捂住了头。{/n}“愿原初动力惩罚我，我明白是怎么回事了！是那些船员在最近这场亚空间航行中发现的异形！这个可怜的疯子肯定是把那个异形当成了帝国卫队的卫兵……您还记得吗，舰长大人？就是那个怒气冲冲的黑暗灵族，强迫几位船员屈从他的意志。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard se sujeta la cabeza.{/n} «¡Que la Fuerza Motriz me abata, creo que ya lo tengo! ¡El xenos al que la tripulación encontró durante el salto de disformidad reciente! Este pobre loco debe de haberle confundido con un guardia... Lord Capitán, ¿recuerda a ese Drukhari furioso que había subyugado a varios tripulantes?».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clutches his head.{/n} "Motive Force strike me down, I think I've got it! The xenos that the crew smoked out during the recent warp jump! This poor madman must have taken him for a Guardsman... Remember, Lord Captain? The enraged Drukhari who had bent several crew members to his will?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard se sujeta la cabeza.{/n} «¡Que la Fuerza Motriz me abata, creo que ya lo tengo! ¡El xenos al que la tripulación encontró durante el salto de disformidad reciente! Este pobre loco debe de haberle confundido con un guardia... Lord Capitán, ¿recuerda a ese Drukhari furioso que había subyugado a varios tripulantes?».

languages.text: {n}Abélard se prend la tête à deux mains.{/n} « Que la Force Motrice m'emporte, je crois que je comprends ! Le xénos débusqué par l'équipage lors du dernier saut Warp ! Ce pauvre fou a dû le prendre pour un garde impérial... Vous en souvenez-vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Le Drukhari furieux qui avait plié plusieurs membres à sa volonté ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clutches his head.{/n} "Motive Force strike me down, I think I've got it! The xenos that the crew smoked out during the recent warp jump! This poor madman must have taken him for a Guardsman... Remember, Lord Captain? The enraged Drukhari who had bent several crew members to his will?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard se prend la tête à deux mains.{/n} « Que la Force Motrice m'emporte, je crois que je comprends ! Le xénos débusqué par l'équipage lors du dernier saut Warp ! Ce pauvre fou a dû le prendre pour un garde impérial... Vous en souvenez-vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Le Drukhari furieux qui avait plié plusieurs membres à sa volonté ? »

languages.text: {n}Abelard greift sich an den Kopf.{/n} "Die Antriebskraft soll mich verlassen, ich glaube, ich hab's! Der Xenos, den die Crew bei dem letzten Warpsprung ausgeräuchert hat! Dieser arme Irre muss ihn für einen Soldaten gehalten haben ... Wisst Ihr noch, Lord Captain? Der zornige Drukhari, der mehrere Crewmitglieder seinem Willen unterworfen hatte?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clutches his head.{/n} "Motive Force strike me down, I think I've got it! The xenos that the crew smoked out during the recent warp jump! This poor madman must have taken him for a Guardsman... Remember, Lord Captain? The enraged Drukhari who had bent several crew members to his will?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard greift sich an den Kopf.{/n} "Die Antriebskraft soll mich verlassen, ich glaube, ich hab's! Der Xenos, den die Crew bei dem letzten Warpsprung ausgeräuchert hat! Dieser arme Irre muss ihn für einen Soldaten gehalten haben ... Wisst Ihr noch, Lord Captain? Der zornige Drukhari, der mehrere Crewmitglieder seinem Willen unterworfen hatte?"

languages.text: {n}Abelard başını kavrıyor.{/n} "Devinim Gücü'nün kurbanı olayım, sanıyorum anladım! Mürettebatın son öte sıçramada ortaya çıkardığı zeno! Bu delirmiş zavallı, onu muhafız sanmış olmalı. Hatırladınız mı Lord Kaptan? Mürettebatı iradesine boyun eğdiren öfkeli bir Drukhari vardı."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clutches his head.{/n} "Motive Force strike me down, I think I've got it! The xenos that the crew smoked out during the recent warp jump! This poor madman must have taken him for a Guardsman... Remember, Lord Captain? The enraged Drukhari who had bent several crew members to his will?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard başını kavrıyor.{/n} "Devinim Gücü'nün kurbanı olayım, sanıyorum anladım! Mürettebatın son öte sıçramada ortaya çıkardığı zeno! Bu delirmiş zavallı, onu muhafız sanmış olmalı. Hatırladınız mı Lord Kaptan? Mürettebatı iradesine boyun eğdiren öfkeli bir Drukhari vardı."
